query: Could you assist in creating a 7-day travel itinerary for 2 travelers, starting from San Diego and visiting 3 different cities in Arizona from March 23rd to March 29th, 2022? Our budget is set at $9,300. We require pet-friendly accommodations since we are bringing along pets. We have preferences for Italian, French, Indian, and Chinese cuisines. We are not planning to take any flights during our journey.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Yuma,Flagstaff,Phoenix]
